pages.text: Runefused Gems can be obtained by combining an Empowered Remnant and a Runic Tablet within a smithing table. Once identified, these gems will reveal a random runic power housed within the gem.
Runefused Gems can be socketed onto Unique weapons that contain an empty [ runefused socket ]. These gems are only capable of housing Runic Powers of the 'On hit' variety.
